verses.name: Acts 13:9
verses.text: Then Saul, (who also is called Paul,) filled with the Holy Ghost, set his eyes on him,

verses.name: Acts 13:10
verses.text: And said, O full of all subtilty and all mischief, thou child of the devil, thou enemy of all righteousness, wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord?

verses.name: Acts 13:11
verses.text: And now, behold, the hand of the Lord is upon thee, and thou shalt be blind, not seeing the sun for a season. And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand.
